content.query:
--Use explain
 EXPLAIN WITH_RECOMMENDATIONS
 SELECT [state]
    , [date]
    , positive
    , SUM([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS BETWEEN 4 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS moving_sum_5days
    , AVG([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS BETWEEN 4 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS moving_avg_5days
    , SUM([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS cum_sum
    , SUM([positive]) OVER(PARTITION BY [state] ORDER BY [date] ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS running_sum_3days
from dbo.COVID_TRACKING
ORDER BY [state], [date];
